did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University
did.unittitle: Hull and Staley (Marion Grocery Company) Ledger Books , 1905-1906
did.physloc: Located in locked compact shelving, level 1.
did.abstract: Contains two cash account and expenditure books from the Hull and Staley (aka Marion Grocery Company) from Marion and Troutdale, Virginia. includes the years 1905-1906. The full inventory can be found here.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. The collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Hull and Staley (Marion Grocery Co.) Ledger Book, Appalachian Collection, McConnell Library, Radford University, Radford, VA. Hull and Staley (Marion Grocery Company) Ledger Books , Accession # AC 009, University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Box contains two ledger books listing personal accounts.
